Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2012 09:19PM Pillow wrote: Ask your onc about the possibility of your mediastinum/neck nodes impinging on your vocal cord nerves. An ENT doc who specializes in voice would be able to tell you for sure about this by looking at your cords in action. Hang in there.
Posts.Title: voice issues/navelbine bhd1 bhd1

Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2011 10:17PM Pillow wrote: I have used Caring Bridge for a couple of years, and it's worked for me.  I don't use Facebook because many of my Facebook Friends are not people I want to share my medical information with.  I understand that Google+ allows you to have different circles of people, and I think you could create a circle just for people you want to share health stuff with, then when you post something, somehow choose that the post only go to that circle.  I think I heard that Facebook is creating a similar system.  And I recently signed on to Lotsahelpinghands, which I don't know that well, but might be worth investigating.
Posts.Title: FB, caring bridge, others-need reviews Kellke Iwillwinthisbattle
